CustomField.description: This flag is set to true in the "Discount an Item" flow if the credit memo is created for a 100% discount as a result of Amaware cancellation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This flag is set to true in the "Discount an Item" flow if the credit memo is created for a 100% discount as a result of Amaware cancellation.
CustomField.label: Is Cancelled Credit Memo
